overview: Action, action, action. Chi Chi LaRue's Link 2 Link is nothing but cocks: thrusting, moaning, squirting, and coated with decent techno music and neat lighting. In short, this thing is completely filthy. Amazingly piggish, don't wear anything clean if you go!
title: Link 2: Link 2 Link (Director's Cut)
